front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Separable Insulated Connector Systems for Power Distribution Systems rated 2.5 kV through 35 kV
front.abstract: Definitions, service conditions, ratings, interchangeable construction features, and tests are established for loadbreak and deadbreak separable insulated connector systems for use on power distribution systems rated 2.5 kV through 35 kV and 900 amps or less.
